channel.title: Close Enough
channel.description: A dual-POV love story set in a coastal Oregon cottage, told in alternating voices.
channel.itunes:author: Elena Cross
channel.itunes:subtitle: Book 1 of The Dolores Effect
channel.itunes:summary: A dual-POV love story set in a coastal Oregon cottage, told in alternating voices.

item.title: Ep 2: Painter's Tape
item.description: Eli Torres settles into the same cottage his sister booked to cure his moping, only to find it already occupied by a woman with painter's tape and opinions. A chance meeting on the beach and a meddling landlord begin to complicate things.

item.title: Ep 1: The Crooked Sign
item.description: Margot Liddell arrives in Compass Cove with a color-coded binder, a shattered event-planning career, and a desperate need for solitude. The cottage is perfect — until she discovers someone else already has a key.
